channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache IoTDB
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache IoTDB

item.title: CVE-2023-24831|2024-10-21T14:17:36.529Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20iotdb
item.description:
Improper Authentication vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache IoTDB.This issue affects Apache IoTDB Grafana Connector: from 0.13.0 through 0.13.3.
Attackers could login without authorization. This is fixed in 0.13.4.
